Name: CreateChild
Description: The right to create children of the object.

Name: DeleteChild
Description: The right to delete children of the object.

Name: ListChildren
Description: The right to list children of this object. For more information about this right,

Name: Self
Description: The right to perform an operation that is controlled by a validated write access right.

Name: ReadProperty
Description: The right to read properties of the object.

Name: WriteProperty
Description: The right to write properties of the object.

Name: DeleteTree
Description: The right to delete all children of this object, regardless of the permissions of the children.

Name: ListObject
Description: The right to list a particular object. For more information about this right

Name: ExtendedRight
Description: A customized control access right. For a list of possible extended rights

Name: Delete
Description: The right to delete the object.

Name: ReadControl
Description: The right to read data from the security descriptor of the object, not including the data in the SACL.

Name: GenericExecute
Description: The right to read permissions on, and list the contents of, a container object.

Name: GenericWrite
Description: The right to read permissions on this object, write all the properties on this object, and perform all validated writes to this object.

Name: GenericRead
Description: The right to read permissions on this object, read all the properties on this object, list this object name when the parent container is listed, and list the contents of this object if it is a container.

Name: WriteDacl
Description: The right to modify the DACL in the object security descriptor.

Name: WriteOwner
Description: The right to assume ownership of the object. The user must be an object trustee. The user cannot transfer the ownership to other users.

Name: GenericAll
Description: The right to create or delete children, delete a subtree, read and write properties, examine children and the object itself, add and remove the object from the directory, and read or write with an extended right.

Name: Synchronize
Description: The right to use the object for synchronization. This right enables a thread to wait until that object is in the signaled state.

Name: AccessSystemSecurity
Description: The right to get or set the SACL in the object security descriptor.

Name: ReadData
Description: Read the key data.

Name: WriteData
Description: Write key data.

Name: ReadExtendedAttributes
Description: Read extended attributes of the key.

Name: WriteExtendedAttributes
Description: Write extended attributes of the key.

Name: ReadAttributes
Description: Read attributes of the key.

Name: WriteAttributes
Description: Write attributes of the key.

Name: Delete
Description: Delete the key.

Name: ReadPermissions
Description: Read permissions for the key.

Name: ChangePermissions
Description: Change permissions for the key.

Name: TakeOwnership
Description: Take ownership of the key.

Name: Synchronize
Description: Use the key for synchronization.

Name: FullControl
Details: Synchronize | TakeOwnership | ChangePermissions | ReadPermissions | Delete | WriteAttributes | ReadAttributes | WriteExtendedAttributes | ReadExtendedAttributes | WriteData | ReadData
Description: Full control of the key.

Name: GenericAll
Description: A combination of GenericRead and GenericWrite.

Name: GenericExecute
Description: Not used.

Name: GenericWrite
Description: Write the key data, extended attributes of the key, attributes of the key, and permissions for the key.

Name: GenericRead
Description: Read the key data, extended attributes of the key, attributes of the key, and permissions for the key.

Name: Modify
Description: The right to set or reset the signaled state of a named event.

Name: Delete
Description: The right to delete a named event.

Name: ReadPermissions
Description: The right to open and copy the access rules and audit rules for a named event.

Name: ChangePermissions
Description: The right to change the security and audit rules associated with a named event.

Name: TakeOwnership
Description: The right to change the owner of a named event.

Name: Synchronize
Description: The right to wait on a named event.

Name: FullControl
Description: The right to exert full control over a named event, and to modify its access rules and audit rules.

Name: ListDirectory
Description: Specifies the right to read the contents of a directory.

Name: ReadData
Description: Specifies the right to open and copy a file or folder. This does not include the right to read file system attributes, extended file system attributes, or access and audit rules.

Name: WriteData
Description: Specifies the right to open and write to a file or folder. This does not include the right to open and write file system attributes, extended file system attributes, or access and audit rules.

Name: CreateFiles
Description: Specifies the right to create a file. This right requires the Synchronize value.

Name: CreateDirectories
Description: Specifies the right to create a folder This right requires the Synchronize value.

Name: AppendData
Description: Specifies the right to append data to the end of a file.

Name: ReadExtendedAttributes
Description: Specifies the right to open and copy extended file system attributes from a folder or file. For example, this value specifies the right to view author and content information. This does not include the right to read data, file system attributes, or access and audit rules.

Name: WriteExtendedAttributes
Description: Specifies the right to open and write extended file system attributes to a folder or file. This does not include the ability to write data, attributes, or access and audit rules.

Name: Traverse
Description: Specifies the right to list the contents of a folder and to run applications contained within that folder.

Name: ExecuteFile
Description: Specifies the right to run an application file.

Name: DeleteSubdirectoriesAndFiles
Description: Specifies the right to delete a folder and any files contained within that folder.

Name: ReadAttributes
Description: Specifies the right to open and copy file system attributes from a folder or file. For example, this value specifies the right to view the file creation or modified date. This does not include the right to read data, extended file system attributes, or access and audit rules.

Name: WriteAttributes
Description: Specifies the right to open and write file system attributes to a folder or file. This does not include the ability to write data, extended attributes, or access and audit rules.

Name: Write
Description: Specifies the right to create folders and files, and to add or remove data from files. This right includes the WriteData right, AppendData right, WriteExtendedAttributes right, and WriteAttributes right.

Name: Delete
Description: Specifies the right to delete a folder or file.

Name: ReadPermissions
Description: Specifies the right to open and copy access and audit rules from a folder or file. This does not include the right to read data, file system attributes, and extended file system attributes.

Name: Read
Description: Specifies the right to open and copy folders or files as read-only. This right includes the ReadData right, ReadExtendedAttributes right, ReadAttributes right, and ReadPermissions right.

Name: ReadAndExecute
Description: Specifies the right to open and copy folders or files as read-only, and to run application files. This right includes the Read right and the ExecuteFile right.

Name: Modify
Description: Specifies the right to read, write, list folder contents, delete folders and files, and run application files. This right includes the ReadAndExecute right, the Write right, and the Delete right.

Name: ChangePermissions
Description: Specifies the right to change the security and audit rules associated with a file or folder.

Name: TakeOwnership
Description: Specifies the right to change the owner of a folder or file. Note that owners of a resource have full access to that resource.

Name: Synchronize
Description: Specifies whether the application can wait for a file handle to synchronize with the completion of an I/O operation. This value is automatically set when allowing access and automatically excluded when denying access.

Name: FullControl
Details: Synchronize | TakeOwnership | ChangePermissions | ReadPermissions | Delete | WriteAttributes | ReadAttributes | DeleteSubdirectoriesAndFiles | Traverse | WriteExtendedAttributes | ReadExtendedAttributes | CreateDirectories | CreateFiles | ListDirectory
Description: Specifies the right to exert full control over a folder or file, and to modify access control and audit rules. This value represents the right to do anything with a file and is the combination of all rights in this enumeration.

Name: Modify
Description: The right to release a named mutex.

Name: Delete
Description: The right to delete a named mutex.

Name: ReadPermissions
Description: The right to open and copy the access rules and audit rules for a named mutex.

Name: ChangePermissions
Description: The right to change the security and audit rules associated with a named mutex.

Name: TakeOwnership
Description: The right to change the owner of a named mutex.

Name: Synchronize
Description: The right to wait on a named mutex.

Name: FullControl
Details: Synchronize | TakeOwnership | ChangePermissions | ReadPermissions | Delete | Modify
Description: The right to exert full control over a named mutex, and to modify its access rules and audit rules.

Name: ReadData
Description: Specifies the right to read data from the pipe. This does not include the right to read file system attributes, extended file system attributes, or access and audit rules.

Name: WriteData
Description: Specifies the right to write data to a pipe. This does not include the right to write file system attributes or extended file system attributes.

Name: CreateNewInstance
Description: Specifies the right to create a new pipe. Setting this right also sets the Synchronize right.

Name: ReadExtendedAttributes
Description: Specifies the right to read extended file system attributes from a pipe. This does not include the right to read data, file system attributes, or access and audit rules.

Name: WriteExtendedAttributes
Description: Specifies the right to write extended file system attributes to a pipe. This does not include the right to write file attributes or data.

Name: ReadAttributes
Description: Specifies the right to read file system attributes from a pipe. This does not include the right to read data, extended file system attributes, or access and audit rules.

Name: WriteAttributes
Description: Specifies the right to write file system attributes to a pipe. This does not include the right to write data or extended file system attributes.

Name: Write
Description: Specifies the right to write to the pipe. This right includes the WriteAttributes, WriteData, and WriteExtendedAttributes rights.

Name: Delete
Description: Specifies the right to delete a pipe.

Name: ReadPermissions
Description: Specifies the right to read access and audit rules from the pipe. This does not include the right to read data, file system attributes, or extended file system attributes.

Name: Read
Description: Specifies the right to read from the pipe. This right includes the ReadAttributes, ReadData, ReadExtendedAttributes, and ReadPermissions rights.

Name: ReadWrite
Description: Specifies the right to read and write from the pipe. This right includes the ReadAttributes, ReadData, ReadExtendedAttributes, ReadPermissions, WriteAttributes, WriteData, and WriteExtendedAttributes rights.

Name: ChangePermissions
Description: Specifies the right to change the security and audit rules that are associated with a pipe.

Name: TakeOwnership
Description: Specifies the right to change the owner of a pipe. Note that owners of a pipe have full access to that resource.

Name: Synchronize
Description: Specifies whether the application can wait for a pipe handle to synchronize with the completion of an I/O operation. This value is automatically set when allowing access to the pipe and automatically excluded when denying access to the pipe. The right to create a pipe requires this value. Note that if you do not explicitly set this value when you create a pipe, the value will be set automatically for you.

Name: FullControl
Details: Synchronize | TakeOwnership | ChangePermissions | ReadPermissions | Delete | CreateNewInstance | WriteExtendedAttributes | ReadExtendedAttributes | WriteAttributes | ReadAttributes | WriteData | ReadData
Description: Specifies the right to exert full control over a pipe, and to modify access control and audit rules. This value represents the combination of all rights in this enumeration.

Name: AccessSystemSecurity
Description: Specifies the right to make changes to the system access control list (SACL).

Name: QueryValues
Description: The right to query the name/value pairs in a registry key.

Name: SetValue
Description: The right to create, delete, or set name/value pairs in a registry key.

Name: CreateSubKey
Description: The right to create subkeys of a registry key.

Name: EnumerateSubKeys
Description: The right to list the subkeys of a registry key.

Name: Notify
Description: The right to request notification of changes on a registry key.

Name: CreateLink
Description: Reserved for system use.

Name: Delete
Description: The right to delete a registry key.

Name: ReadPermissions
Description: The right to open and copy the access rules and audit rules for a registry key.

Name: WriteKey
Description: The right to create, delete, and set the name/value pairs in a registry key, to create or delete subkeys, to request notification of changes, to enumerate its subkeys, and to read its access rules and audit rules.

Name: ExecuteKey
Description: The right to query the name/value pairs in a registry key, to request notification of changes, to enumerate its subkeys, and to read its access rules and audit rules.

Name: ReadKey
Description: The right to query the name/value pairs in a registry key, to request notification of changes, to enumerate its subkeys, and to read its access rules and audit rules.

Name: ChangePermissions
Description: The right to change the access rules and audit rules associated with a registry key.

Name: TakeOwnership
Description: The right to change the owner of a registry key.

Name: FullControl
Details: TakeOwnership | ChangePermissions | ReadPermissions | Delete | CreateLink | Notify | EnumerateSubKeys | CreateSubKey | SetValue | QueryValues
Description: The right to exert full control over a registry key, and to modify its access rules and audit rules.

Name: Modify
Description: The right to release a named semaphore.

Name: Delete
Description: The right to delete a named semaphore.

Name: ReadPermissions
Description: The right to open and copy the access rules and audit rules for a named semaphore.

Name: ChangePermissions
Description: The right to change the security and audit rules associated with a named semaphore.

Name: TakeOwnership
Description: The right to change the owner of a named semaphore.

Name: Synchronize
Description: The right to wait on a named semaphore.

Name: FullControl
Description: The right to exert full control over a named semaphore, and to modify its access rules and audit rules.

Name: CopyOnWrite
Description: The right to read and write to a file with the restriction that write operations will not be seen by other processes.

Name: Write
Description: The right to add data to a file or remove data from a file.

Name: Read
Description: The right to open and copy a file as read-only.

Name: Execute
Description: The right to run an application file.

Name: Delete
Description: The right to delete a file.

Name: ReadPermissions
Description: The right to open and copy access and audit rules from a file. This does not include the right to read data, file system attributes, or extended file system attributes.

Name: ChangePermissions
Description: The right to change the security and audit rules associated with a file.

Name: TakeOwnership
Description: The right to change the owner of a file.

Name: ReadWrite
Description: The right to open and copy a file, and the right to add data to a file or remove data from a file.

Name: ReadExecute
Description: The right to open and copy a folder or file as read-only, and to run application files. This right includes the Read right and the Execute right.

Name: ReadWriteExecute
Description: The right to open and copy a file, the right to add data to a file or remove data from a file, and the right to run an application file.

Name: FullControl
Details: ReadWriteExecute | TakeOwnership | ChangePermissions | ReadPermissions | Delete | CopyOnWrite
Description: he right to exert full control over a file, and to modify access control and audit rules. This value represents the right to do anything with a file and is the combination of all rights in this enumeration.

Name: AccessSystemSecurity
Description: The right to get or set permissions on a file.

Name: AllAccess
Details: STANDARD_RIGHTS_REQUIRED | Connect | CreateService | EnumerateService  | Lock | QueryLockStatus| ModifyBootConfig

Name: AllAccess
Details: STANDARD_RIGHTS_REQUIRED  | QueryConfig | ChangeConfig  | QueryStatus | EnumerateDependents | Start | Stop | PauseContinue | Interrogate | UserDefinedControl

Name: AccessSystemSecurity
Description: access the SACL

Name: Delete
Description: delete the service.

Name: ReadControl
Description: query the security descriptor of the service object.

Name: WriteDac
Description: modify the Dacl member of the service object's security descriptor.

Name: WriteOwner
Description: modify the Owner and Group members of the service object's security descriptor.
